content.question: Which of the following best summarizes the author’s thesis?

choices.label: Video gaming principally attracts people who are interested in collaborating with others.
Pierre Lévy’s concept of “collective intelligence” is the best way to interpret the culture of video gaming.
Because the problems posed by video games are strategic, they can be solved only with collaborative effort.
Video gaming helps develop collaborative problem-solving skills that can be useful in the real world.

content.answer: Video gaming helps develop collaborative problem-solving skills that can be useful in the real world.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
